name: MANYFACED RUINING THE SHOW
description:
2d shooter, where you need to choose direction of shooting by changing role. uni work, first attempt to write in english bout my projects

manyfaced doll is tired of being in the back of plays in theater. manyfaced wants to regain desirable attention from public by destroying the show.

wasd — walk

left mouse button — shoot

space — jump

1 — jester (shoot right)

2 — mourner (shoot left)

3 — warrior (shoot up)

4 — prewise (shoot down)
